thread.title: China’s HNA to Buy Swissport From PAI Partners for $2.8 Billion
thread.title_full: China’s HNA to Buy Swissport From PAI Partners for $2.8 Billion - Bloomberg Business

author: Richard Weiss
title: China’s HNA to Buy Swissport From PAI Partners for $2.8 Billion
text:
HNA Group Co., the owner of China’s fourth-largest airline, agreed to buy airport luggage handler Swissport International Ltd. from PAI Partners SAS for 2.73 billion Swiss francs ($2.81 billion).
HNA will run the operator as a stand-alone business within its group, the companies said in a statement on Thursday. Swissport is the world´s largest ground and cargo handling company.
